title: TRIAL:Real Material Faces
summary: This is a high-quality animation watch face collection.Trial version.
description: Futuristic animation watch faces for round and square watches (HUAWEI Watch, Sony Smart Watch 3, LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, Moto360 ...).Trial version. Watch Faces- Earth     (day and night is switched to the beautiful animation)- Sunset     (animation the sun sink into the sea)- Eye     (Realistic centerpiece of animation for Halloween)- Ink     (animation as if dropped the black ink into the water)- Galaxy     (animation of the spiral galaxy)- Fur - Magic Circle - Edo Kiriko      (Animation the image of Edo Kiriko is the Edo(Old Tokyo) traditional craft faceted)- Slime- Radar- Ripples     (ripples of animation that spread the water surface)- The sun     (animation of the burning sun)- Black and White TV- SciFi- Monster cat eye- Frames- Vivid- ElectricalFunctions- Twelve types of animated background- You can change the numbers- Hiding numbers- Favorites list function- Battery level indicator- Date and time display function- Day of the week display functionImportant point- In Moto360 1st Gen, it has to reduce the processing load by lowering the resolution.TRIAL:Real Material Watch Faces
descriptionHTML:
Futuristic animation watch faces for round and square watches (HUAWEI Watch, Sony Smart Watch 3, LG Urbane, LG G Watch R, Moto360 ...).

Trial version.

Watch Faces
- Earth (day and night is switched to the beautiful animation)
- Sunset (animation the sun sink into the sea)
- Eye (Realistic centerpiece of animation for Halloween)
- Ink (animation as if dropped the black ink into the water)
- Galaxy (animation of the spiral galaxy)
- Fur
- Magic Circle
- Edo Kiriko (Animation the image of Edo Kiriko is the Edo(Old Tokyo) traditional craft faceted)
- Slime
- Radar
- Ripples (ripples of animation that spread the water surface)
- The sun (animation of the burning sun)
- Black and White TV
- SciFi
- Monster cat eye
- Frames
- Vivid
- Electrical

Functions
- Twelve types of animated background
- You can change the numbers
- Hiding numbers
- Favorites list function
- Battery level indicator
- Date and time display function
- Day of the week display function

Important point
- In Moto360 1st Gen, it has to reduce the processing load by lowering the resolution.

TRIAL:Real Material Watch Faces
recentChanges: bug fix : Crush on android wear 1.4.
added : Include live wallpaper for the phone.
